item.title: Please remove
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

twinky12341:

tbh this whole post makes no since maybe you should try to make stuff more clear if you really want help

He wants it so that:
-You type ::firecape l561kl798m
-The l561kl798m is in a text document (for donators, they get the PIN code and can redeem it in-game)
-When typed, the pin code is removed, and can never be used again.

It’s not hard to understand…

del piero1994:

dude dont worry about the pay by phone…all i wanna do is make a command that is like this ::firecape (number) and this numbers gets deleted from a .txt so no one could use it again

Honestly, I don’t think you can make such a code.
Oh who am I kidding, you can make any code for anything… You can probz make a code that makes rsps characters explode into pieces, but nobody has the brain power for such a feat.
Anyways, that code seems a little advanced, even for the best of us.

how do i do that?[/quote]
